sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"取消，废除"之意
means: abolish ：正式用词，指彻底废除某种制度、规章或习俗。
cancel ：用法广泛，多指取消债务、合同、证书、比赛、旅行、计划或约会等。
repeal书面用词，指撤销立法机关通过的协议、法案或法律等。

sentence.Network_en: Next year will be the 60th anniversary of the repeal of Prohibition.
sentence.Network_cn: 明年将是禁酒令废除60周年。

sentence.Network_en: He plans to repeal a number of current policies.
sentence.Network_cn: 他计划废除一些当前的政策。

sentence.Network_en: Many voted for the repeal of that property law.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多人投票赞成废止那项财产法.

PerfectNetExp.abs: GRE分类词汇总结_百度文库 ... 废止，不用 relinquish v． 放弃，废除 repeal v． 废除，取消 revocable adj．.
普通英汉小词典_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... repast 餐饮 repeal 撤销 repeat 重复.
英语同义词|英语近义词大全|英语近义词在线查询 ... rescind v. 废除, 取消 repeal v. 废止, 撤消 annul v. 废除, 消减.
英语同义词|英语近义词大全|英语近义词在线查询 ... rescind v. 废除, 取消 repeal v. 废止, 撤消 annul v. 废除, 消减.

list.abs: 1991-Apartheid : the South African Parliament repeals the Population Registration Act , which had required all racial classification of all Africans at birth .1991年的今天，种族隔离：南非国会撤销了要求对所有南非新生儿进行种族分类的《人口注册法案》。

the committee's plan repeals the current provision that allows taxpayers exclude from taxation 60 % of the long-term theywhen they sell stocks , real estate and other assets .委员会的计划取消一项现有条款，即准许纳税人出售股票、房产和其它不动产所得的百分之六十免于课税。
(1)在本条例中，除文意另有所指外─“已废除条例”(repealed Ordinance) 指由第21条废除的《香港中文大学条例》*(第1109章，1965年版)；“大学校董会”(Council)、“教务会”(Senate)、“评议会”(Convocation)、.
the congress decided to repeal the law ., 议会决定废除那项法令.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French repeler, from Old French re- (expressing reversal) + apeler 'to call, appeal'

entry.def: If the government repeals a law, it officially ends it, so that it is no longer valid.

example.ex: The government has just repealed the law segregating public facilities.
example.tran: 政府刚刚废止了不同种族分开使用公共设施的法令。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of abrogating; an official or legal cancellation

auth_sentence.content: President Barack Obama signed the repeal into law Wednesday.
auth_sentence.res_content: President Barack Obama signed the repeal into law Wednesday.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: President Barack Obama signed the repeal into law Wednesday.

auth_sentence.content: Only God can repeal the laws of fluid dynamics.
auth_sentence.res_content: Only God can repeal the laws of fluid dynamics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Only God can repeal the laws of fluid dynamics.

auth_sentence.content: They said they weren't looking to repeal it.
auth_sentence.res_content: They said they weren't looking to repeal it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They said they weren't looking to repeal it.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"回,向后,相反,不"; 2. 表示"一再,重新"

stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+pugn打+ant……的→[把人]打回去→[行为]令人厌恶的
re回,向后,相反,不+son声音+ant……的→声音回过来→回响的
re反+vers转+e→反转的
re一再,重新+splend光辉+ent……的→再光辉→辉煌的
re回,向后,相反,不+neg否认+ade个人或集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
re回,向后,相反,不+peal驱动→反驱动→取消;参考:appeal呼吁
re不+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏
re向后+st站→立于后面者→其他的[人,物]
re一再,重新+cidiv掉下+ism行为,现象→再次掉入罪行
re一再,重新+pose放→再放下[工作]→休息
re一再,重新+surg升起,浪潮+ence表名词→重起浪潮→复兴
re回,向后,相反,不+proach接近→不接近→指责
re反+volt转→反过转→反叛
re回+call喊;想→回想
re回+flect弯曲→弯曲返回→反射
re回,向后,相反,不+linqu离开+ish表动词→离开不再要→放弃
re回,向后,相反,不+mov运动,移动+e→移开,消除
re回,向后,相反,不+pel推→击退
re反+sent感觉→反感→不满
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
re回+tract拉→拉回,缩回
re回+treat→v.后退,撤退
re一再,重新+arrange安排→v.重新安排
re一再,重新+assure确保→v.消除某人疑虑
re一再,重新+capit头+ulate=ate表动词→重新把头拿出来→概括要点
re一再,重新+claim喊→喊回来→取回,引申为开垦荒地
re一再,重新+commend赞扬→一再赞扬
re一再,重新+furbish装饰→再装饰→刷新
re一再,重新+in入+carn肉+ate表动词→重新进入肉体→产生
re一再,重新+in入+state国家,权力→重新进入权力
re一再,重新+iterate重说→反复重说

stems_affixes.value_cn: 描述,表示,象征;代表;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: re一再+present出席的;上演→一再上演,出席的→象征;代表
re一再,重新+produce生产,制造→v. 生殖;再现;繁殖;复制
re一再,重新+verber震动+ate表动词→重新震动→起回声

sentences.en: The Labour Party repealed the Act.

jushi.english: The Labour Party repealed the Act.
